txt.en:
'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from the Glimmerdeep. They have found the old mine overrun with Dourhands! Those dwarves have no sense of honour and will cause nothing but trouble in the Grey Mountains. We must put a stop to their mining efforts.

'If the Dourhands have nowhere to mine, then perhaps they will leave these mountains for good!'
Your mission is to defeat Dourhands in Glimmerdeep.\n\nSpeak to Ausma to travel to Glimmerdeep.
Dourhands have found the Glimmerdeep and seek to mine what they can from its depthsâ€¦.\n\nYour mission is to defeat Dourhands in Glimmerdeep.
Monsters in this mission will apply a corruption buff to nearby allies.
You have been tasked with defeating Dourhands in the Glimmerdeep.
Complete Mission: Dourhands in the Deep
DNT - 'When you are ready, my scouts will lead you to Glimmerdeep.'
'Well done! With those Dourhands defeated, the Glimmerdeep is once again safe. We should look to resume our mining efforts there once all the Dourhands have vacated the mines.'
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Ausma for your reward!
